pr_title: fixing template argument if not specify values

timeline.message: fixing template argument if not specify values

timeline.bodyHTML:
We should update IngestionJobLauncher.getSegmentGenerationJobSpec()
Line #57, if (context != null) {
propertiesMap.putAll(context);
}
We should check not null and empty. As you are passing empty map incase of values is null.
timeline.author: Manoj-Singh-11

replies.bodyText: if context is an empty map, then propertiesMap won't change. This is just for NPE check.
replies.author: xiangfu0
